title: How tall is Matthew McConaughey really? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well I somehow remember years back his IMDb profile listing him as 6′3″, but come to find out he’s actually only 5′10 3/4″ according to  How tall are Celebrities?12765 Celebrity Heights 1269 Celebrity Photos Latest Celebrity Heights More...
